panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: kube Service Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{type="kube"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_5m{type="kube"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="kube"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{type="kube"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="kube"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_30m{type="kube"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="kube"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_6h{type="kube"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",type="kube"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/

panels.title: kube Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{type="kube"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{type="kube"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="kube"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{type="kube"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="kube"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{type="kube"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="kube"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{type="kube"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",type="kube"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: kube Service RPS - Requests per Second

panels.description: Saturation is a measure of what ratio of a finite resource is currently being utilized. Lower is better.

  label_replace(

    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_5m{component="apiserver",type="kube"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="apiserver",type="kube"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="apiserver",type="kube"} < on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="apiserver",type="kube"})))),

panels.title: apiserver SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

The Kubernetes API server validates and configures data for the api objects which
include pods, services, and others. The API Server services REST operations
and provides the frontend to the cluster's shared state through which all other components
interact.

This SLI measures all non-health-check endpoints. Long-polling endpoints are excluded from apdex scores.



### Observability Tools
panels.title: Details
Estimated p95 apiserver Latency - per scope
Apdex attribution for apiserver Latency - per scope
Estimated p95 apiserver Latency - per resource
Apdex attribution for apiserver Latency - per resource

panels.description:
disk space utilization on persistent volume claims.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(cluster,namespace,persistentvolumeclaim) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes
      /
      kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: kube_persistent_volume_claim_disk_space component saturation: Kube Persistent Volume Claim Space Utilisation

panels.description:
inode utilization on persistent volume claims.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(persistentvolumeclaim) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used
      /
      kubelet_volume_stats_inodes
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: kube_persistent_volume_claim_inodes component saturation: Kube Persistent Volume Claim inode Utilisation

panels.description:
This resource measures average CPU utilization across an all cores in a node group

If it is becoming saturated, it may indicate that the node group needs resizing.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(type) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      1 - avg by (type) (
        rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", type=~".*pool"}[5m])
      )
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: node_group_cpu component saturation: Average Node Pool CPU Utilization
